mapper.select: select cal_num, cal_title, cal_writer, cal_contents, TO_char(starts, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') starts, allday, islive from calendar where islive = 1
mapper.insert: insert into calendar(cal_num, cal_title,cal_contents, starts, ends, allday, islive) values( Reply_num.nextval, #{cal_title}, #{cal_contents}, default, default, 1, 1 )
mapper.update: update calendar set cal_contents= #{cal_contents} where cal_num= #{cal_num}
mapper.select: update calendar set islive = 0 where cal_num = #{cal_num}
